com.joliciel.talismane.parser

Interface NonDeterministicParser

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Parser
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    TransitionBasedParser

    public interface NonDeterministicParser
extends Parser
    A non-deterministic parser, which analyses multiple pos-tagging possibilities for this sentence, and returns multiple parse configurations.
    Author:
    Assaf Urieli

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface com.joliciel.talismane.parser.Parser

        Parser.ParseComparisonStrategyType, Parser.PredictTransitions

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getBeamWidth()
      The maximum size of the beam to be used during analysis.
      boolean isPropagatePosTaggerBeam()
      Should the full pos-tagger beam be propagated as input into the parser.
      java.util.List<ParseConfiguration> parseSentence(java.util.List<PosTagSequence> posTagSequences)
      Analyse a list of pos-tag sequences, each of which represents one possibility of tagging a given sentence, and return the n most likely parse configurations for the sentence.

      • Methods inherited from interface com.joliciel.talismane.parser.Parser

        addObserver, cloneParser, getMaxAnalysisTimePerSentence, getMinFreeMemory, getParseComparisonStrategy, getParseFeatures, getParserRules, getTransitionSystem, parseSentence

    • Method Detail

      • parseSentence

        java.util.List<ParseConfiguration> parseSentence(java.util.List<PosTagSequence> posTagSequences)
                                          throws UnknownDependencyLabelException,
                                                 UnknownTransitionException,
                                                 InvalidTransitionException,
                                                 CircularDependencyException,
                                                 TalismaneException,
                                                 java.io.IOException
        Analyse a list of pos-tag sequences, each of which represents one possibility of tagging a given sentence, and return the n most likely parse configurations for the sentence.
        Parameters:
        posTagSequences - the n most likely pos-tag sequences for this sentence.
        Returns:
        the n most likely parse sequences for this sentence
        Throws:
        UnknownTransitionException - if an attempt is made to apply an unknown transition
        UnknownDependencyLabelException - if an attempt is made to apply an unknown label
        CircularDependencyException - if an attempt is made to generate a circular dependency
        InvalidTransitionException - if a transition is applied without meeting pre-conditions
        TalismaneException
        java.io.IOException

      • getBeamWidth

        int getBeamWidth()
        The maximum size of the beam to be used during analysis.

      • isPropagatePosTaggerBeam

        boolean isPropagatePosTaggerBeam()
        Should the full pos-tagger beam be propagated as input into the parser.
